message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000.  What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe I can't pay more than $10,000 for it. Would you consider meeting me halfway?
Hi Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. While I appreciate your perspective, I'm looking to get closer to my original asking price. Would you be willing to consider $13,000?
Thank you for your response, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $12,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with both of our expectations.
